attributes.action: Allow a 2nd Independence Referendum for Scotland to decide its future in the EU
attributes.additional_details: Scotland should decide its own future on independence and membership of the EU instead of being forced to leave against the will of the majority of the population
attributes.background: We the undersigned call upon HM Government to allow a 2nd Scottish Independence Referendum after 62% of Scottish residents voted Remain in the EU Referendum and will be forced to leave the EU against the will of the populace

rejection.details:
We think the following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/132667
